root: ^Trat's good. What did you tell her?
^I told her that I know this is scary, and that I'm scared too.
^I told her that I don't know how to save her,but that I would never stop trying.
^I also told her, above everything else, that she wasn't alone.
^That I cared about her, and that I loved her, and that I would never give up on her or forget about her.
^I know, but you've done the best thing you can do. Even then, the best thing you can do can't always fix everything.
^But what if she never comes back?
^Yeah, I just can't le tmyself think about it.
^But if it does happen, I guess I'll just have to stay by her side.
^I don't know what else you could do.
